casebody.data:
Samuel Lee GASKINS
v.
Larry DAIL, Superintendent No. 398P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2017 Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Samuel L. Gaskins, for Gaskins, Samuel Lee

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 6th of November 2017 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Craven County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2017."
